https //youtu be/vticjat11s8 4 **crochet hook ** size g 4mm hook 5 **notations ** removable stitch marker 6 yarn needle to weave in ends 7 scissors 8 leather strip 9 optional leather hole punch 10 optional **yarn ** wecrochet city tweed dk weight 11 55% merino wool 25% superfine alpaca 20% donegal tweed 123 yds/50g **yardage ** colorways snowbank 2 balls 180 yds blue blood 1 ball 90 yds toad 2 balls 180 yds total yardage is approx 450yds **abbreviations ** chain - chain rs - right side single_crochet - single_crochet decrease - single_crochet two together slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es ssc - split single_crochet ws - wrong side yo- yarn over **gauge ** 17 sts x 21 row = 4x4 inches in ssc **measurements ** 19 from folded cuff to toe 11 circumference **skill level **
